content.detailedDescription: My story is kinda boring. family went on a fishing trip. while there by the river taking photos of kids. when i got home i was going thru them. thats when i saw it. i have pics but for some reason they wont load. please send me a email to send them.
content.summary: Taking pics who le family fishing. seen in photo

content.detailedDescription:
Was at birthday party on june 7, 2014 and the time was around 10 pm.  the night was clear.  all of a sudden we looked up and noticed something flying overhead.  to me in was shaped like a figure 8 and had blinking lights which was blue and it was pulsating.  that is what i saw.  everyone just stared at it while it went over us, very high 500 feet, and than we said what the heck was that. it seemed to be slow than stop and switch paths going north. nobody could figure what it was.  i have never in my 64 years seen anything like it.
i'm not sure if anyone took a video from there phone, i was just shocked. of the 15 people they might have more information but this is what i felt and saw at that moment.
content.summary: At party and at least 15 people saw it and none of us could explain what it was

content.detailedDescription: I just got home from work and was taking the dogs out,,caught my attention looked like a fire work going up about 20 blocks away,,didn't pay much attention until it stopped and hovered,,then i thought it might be a helicopter,i looked away,when i looked back at it it was coming towards me and just didn't look right no blinking,,no green or white and no sound..Then it went right over me at about 75 ft it was maybe the size of a small car..No sound whatsoever and it was like a plasma looking orb with the colors mixing around..Almost like looking into a fire ,,was yelling for my neighbor to come and look but he had the tv in the garage on loud and did not here me till it was out of site...I've seen chinese lanterns before and was not even close to that..Called the sheriffs office the next day to see if someone else had seen it ,,she looked threw the records and did not find anything...My wife just pulled in the drive seconds later but did not see it either...Then my friend at work said after new years eve...Did you see the news last night a lady in cape coral saw the same thing i had described to him...When i got home i looked on u tube and the whole country from oregon to missouri saw similar things to what i saw...
content.summary: Thougth it was a firework going up then it stopped so i thought it was maybe a helicopter then it stated coming right towards me and the light did not look like a normal airplane light, it was like plasma red yellow orange flew right over me no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my dads truck then i looked up and saw 2 black balls then 1 turned silver then they both disapered
content.summary: It was a black ufo then turned silver then was gone

content.detailedDescription: Last night around 9:50 to 10:20 i saw 6 white lights i went out front with my brother at 9:30 to sky watch then i saw i dim white light real high up it was going north to south i thought it was a satellite it might have been so i just wrote it down what i saw but 5 minutes latter my brother seen a light going north to south it was not as dim as the first but had a wobble to it so i wrote it down then a few minutes after that t saw a super bright white light going so fast over my house it was going south to north it had a wobble and it would stop for a split second then it would dim real low light but still moving fast it would light up bright then dim down it kept doing that till i couldn't see it i wrote it down then my brother ran in and said he saw another bright light go over our house but it was gone by time i got outside i wrote down what he saw so we sat down and a little before 10:20 we saw another bright white light his one was the brightest out of all of hem but it was going north to south it was hauling ass with a wobble and stop for a split second but it would dim out then flare up real bright then out of no where it dimed out flickered out then disappeared i never came back on but i could see a craft i couldn't tell what shape but i saw a craft still moving south it was real faint then didn't see it anymore we stayed out till 11 i have bad arthritis i was starting to hurt real bad i had to lay down but we never seen any white lights again after he one that never came back on these were real high up so i cant say what size they were or how high they were i been seeing those allot more i still see the reddish orange orbs of if you would like to say orbs all i know they are all ufos to me i don't know what they are but someone called me from mufon but it was a broken up message i didn't get he guys name or number he message was all broken up
content.summary: I saw 6 white lights

content.detailedDescription:
It started 5:30am in feb 2006. i was suddenly awakened by a strong feeling of some presence in the room. the room was very quiet, so no sound woke me. i was lying on my back and i turned my head to look at the clock and it said 5:30 am and i remember thinking , that i had just 1 more hour to sleep until i had to get up for work. then while my head was still turned i noticed this fairly large irregular 3 dimensional shape on the wall behind my alarm clock, it was pulsating with red turning to orange and then yellow continuously without any sound, i was scared but fascinated and as i tried to move i couln't i was immobile, and then i felt this strong presence on my chest, but there was no weight to it, and i tried to turn my head back to see what it could be,  i kept trying , until i finally was able to move my head back but it took a lot of effort. when i finally managed to turn my head back, this is when i saw the entity, it looked right into me, it had large black shiny eyes almost like glass and the skin was a dull matt grey , it looked like clay with folds in the skin, the nose was just two pin holes with a very small mouth, it had a flat expression,  this scared me so much i let out a scream so loud, and the entity then reacted with putting his very long finger on the left side of my temple and a flash of light, like electricity went through my temple and as this happened  the entity disappeared like it never existed. by this time my husband at the time who was sleeping next to me woke up, he heard me scream, and i asked him if he had seen anything or felt  anything and he said no.
the whole day at work, i was thinking about the experience. i was embarrassed by my experienced that i only told a few close friends and family, but even some were making fun of it. so i did not speak much of it anymore. however ever since i have had that experience, a month later i started getting these terrible headaches. i have been to many specialists and neurologists and brain scans, no one knows why i have these headaches, and 8 years later, i am still with the headaches.
content.summary: It started 5:30am in feb 2006, strange irregular glowing 3-d shape on bedroom wall, pulsating from red to orange and to yellow and then an entity appeared on my chest with big black eyes and clay like skin

content.detailedDescription:
1. romare bearden park in uptown charlotte, nc

2. this object was not seen/noticed with the naked eye.

3. upon noticing it, i was flabbergasted at it being so symmetrical on all sides.  i am not sure if it was or is a drone of some kind or even a military vehicle.  it appears in about six different pictures but never observed while taking the picture itself.

4. as mentioned above, it was triangular with a u like cradle at the bottom.  there also appears to be some kind of apparatus extending from the underside of the vehicle.

5. i was very confused as i'd never been witness to anything like this before.  as you can see, it didn't seem to be visible to anyone in the park at that time because there was never a sighting leading to a spectacle.  

6. n/a

i might add that the pictures were taken with a nikon d3200 and a 18-55mm kit.  the pictures were taken in the raw setting and edited for aesthetics only.  i have full exif data embedded into each file and have at least 6 raw files showing the same strange vehicle.
content.summary: This was not noticed during photo composition with the naked eye.  only noticed upon developing raw files.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the south side of colombia missouri doing a night road paving job at or around 11:15pm i saw a flash of light in the sky to the north i continued watching the spot when i saw it again this time it had moved south closer to me in the area of the sky of the big dipper it didnt appear to emit light but reflect the lights from the ground kind of flareing appearing to be round or spherical. i continued to watch the sky and follow its course south but it did not appear again.As far as my feelings i was amazed even felt energized it was not something you expect to see in the sky
content.summary: Transparent or invisable object that intermittently reflected lights from the ground

content.detailedDescription: On june 7th 2014 at approximately 10 pm i was walking back to my house from the neighbor's around 10:15pm. i was walking south when i observed 3 lights in the sky quite distant (likely over lake ontario). the lights looked like 3 balls of fire in the sky. they shifted slowly and slightly for about 45 seconds and then started moving upwards and slowly disappeared. initially i though it was an airplane coming towards me but the red and blue lights were not visible. i am a pilot and this certainly did not move like any aircraft i have seen. i thought is was really neat but immediately got on the internet to see if anyone else had reported these lights. i noticed one other similar report on this website but i think the person got the date wrong. my wife also witnessed the event
content.summary: 3 lights closely clustered over lake ontario. hovered together for about 45 seconds then went up slowly and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from dinner on tuesday, june 3, 2014. at approximately 8:15 pm when i turned onto my road, i noticed an incredible fog rolling into the 300+ acre field across the street from my house.  i pulled my car over and took several pictures of the fog rolling into the field and onto the road.  a few minutes later, immediately upon returning home, i posted seven fog pictures to facebook directly from my iphone. 

later in the evening, i looked at the pictures i posted from the vantage point of my laptop.  in one picture, i noticed three objects in a triangle formation.  it struck me as odd, as birds don't typically fly in a formation like that.  i downloaded the picture into my basic photograph editor on my macbook air.  i cropped the picture and zoomed in on the three objects.  they appear round and metallic and you can easily see air disturbance around each object.  it is important to note that i did not notice these objects when i was taking the pictures, nor did i hear any sound associated with them at all.  

mufon is welcome to analyze this photograph and, if interested, i will provide my iphone for further analysis. any feedback regarding the nature of these objects would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Taking iphone pictures of fog rolling into field.  posted 7 pictures to facebook and noticed 3 objects in triangle formation not witnessed when picture was taken

content.detailedDescription: at the time i was photographing the full moon raising from this volcanic crater, i paid no attention to the small very bright light that appeared near the top of this crater, i shot off about twenty shots and left to continue my travel to arizona. only after i arrived at my home did i look at what i had photographic and noticed the bright light that appeared in each photo, since the mountain or hill was not that high nor that far from my location the light could not have been a star or planet, then i just do not know what it is or why it was were it was at.  once the moon had cleared the crater there was nothing left for me to do so i moved on, i thought you might be interested in seeing these photos!
content.summary: Taking photos of  full moon ascending form what appeared a volcanic creater

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd in person at the site (submitter wishes to remain anonymous so my own phone number is inserted) the witness is a deputy sheriff. 


"i saw your report about the 1969 ufo sighting over lake city army ammo plant and decided to talk to someone about it. i must remain anonymous because of my position or i could lose my job. other people have reported similar things and have been transferred or lost their job. what i saw is unexplainable. i work nights and i patrol eastern independence. for a couple of years now i've been seeing strange lights or balls of lights in the trees and along the highways (78 and 7). the lights range from baseball sized to larger than a basketball and are generally white, blue, or orange. at the time of this most recent event i was driving north on highway 7 just past the little blue river when i noticed a small white ball of light and a larger orange fireball to my east (right side) at about 30 yards from my position also moving north at approximately 45 mph. i watched the objects for approximately 10-15 seconds then they moved further east and out of sight. at that point, i noticed a sliver metallic spherical shaped object ne of my position, which would have been near or over the army ammo plant. the object was hovering and spinning and at times looked like a saucer shape, then morphed back to a spherical shape. it began to move very slowly further north for a few more seconds, then stopped. i pulled into the little blue trace park and got out of my vehicle to observe it more closely. the object remained in the area, moving very slowly around in circles and back and forth just above the tree line approximately 300 feet from the ground and perhaps approximately 500 - 1,000 feet away from me,or maybe more. then the object flew away at a high rate of speed to the se at 75 degrees. it appeared to stop and at that point was very small and looked like a large planet. then this object and four others that were already in that position that just looked like stars moved around a little bit and then stopped close together. a small fighter jet came into the area from the east and circled twice in a large circle, then returned in the same direction it came from. i mentioned this to another deputy and he said he had been seeing strange things in the area for years but he didn't tell anyone about it until now. 

note: this is the same location as the blue springs lights in 2012, a sighting of a sphere ufo in 2013, and the recent 1969 report.
content.summary: Two balls of light and one large ufo near army ammo plant

content.detailedDescription:
This is one of many strange experiences we've been having.

we just so happened to go to a shopping center we never go to, and ended up seeing this object.

it was coming towards us in a reddish/orange glow. red was a lot more prominent. there was no flashing lights at all, the red was flickering like a candle. 

we waited to see what it was- we thought it was a helicopter- but when it was going over top of us, the red light started dimming untill you saw a black circle with a small red dot, then the red dot dissapeared and we were left watching a giant black basketball sized object just fly across the sky. 

it was better than any ufo video i've ever seen. someone suggested it could've been a beacon copter- but it made no noise and went over top of us. multiple people witnessed- and i have a video recording on my phone that is clear. i would love to talk to a field investigator soon.

i also have a video with two women talking about the object we saw. they were frightened.

the videos are on my phone and i am out of data so i cannot upload the video- i will be glad to send it or show it in person.
content.summary: Saw women watching it and filmed a red orb turn black right in front of our eyes

content.detailedDescription: It was the summer of 1984, stars were out and i was riding my dirt bike home from work.  i got out of work about 11:30 pm and was on my normal route of trails and back roads.  i pulled onto south airport road shortly after midnight heading south, started going through the gears and noticed to my left something with multicolored lights just above the tree line hovering there.  i stopped just about a 1/4 of a mile down airport road and was watching this object just floating there in the corner of the potato field.  as i was watching this thing wondering what it was and then all of a sudden it was directly over top of me, in a instant.  i was round in shape, bright multicolored lights on the perimeter, dark on the bottom and the lights inside of the object were like dash lights shining but much brighter.  the windows appeared to go around the object but not totally sure about that.  the size was about 50-75 feet across but this is a guess.  i was looking inside to see if i could see any thing inside but could not.  all this happened with in about 3-5 minutes time.  as i was starring at this object in amazement and wondering what it was, all of a sudden i realized it was not a normal craft that i knew of, it made no sound that i could tell but my dirt bike was still running, the craft was just floating there, then i got scared and took off on my bike just as fast as i could going through the gears.  i looked back and there it was just above the trees chasing me, i looked back a second time and it was right there, shifted into 6th, looked back and it was gone.  i got home and pulled into the driveway looking but not seeing anything above me, parked my bike went inside and never told anyone about what happened.  i thought if i told of what i had seen or experienced they would think it was a joke or i was crazy.  it was about 20 years or so later that i had finally told my wife about what happened that night.  i still to this day do not know what it was but i remember as if it was yesterday. i will more that likely never forget that night, it was cool and scary at the same time.
content.summary: Multi-colored hovering object middle of night in corner of field, then above me.

content.detailedDescription: 1.Girlfriends ,we had left a wedding shower. 2 one of the other girls in the car spoted this craft. 3. we slamed on the brakes and slid of the road.We were under this craft that was about 30 feet above us, there was a ring of soft orange glowing lights,with a light moving around the glowing area.There were 5 girls in the vical,when we slid off the rd. girl4 who spoted the craft was screeming roll up the windows and lock the doors. so we did. girl 1 who was driving the car tryed to get in tough with her dad on a c b raido, popular in 1974. i noticed there was another car, reatively close by. i was on the back passager side and had a clear view of the craft. i tryed very hard not to blink so i would not miss any thing, while we watch it disapeard with us watching, 3 girls were sisters my self and another friend. my grandmother had something along this line,she could tell you part of the story, but not all of the story.. i also remenber a child hood images and a second encounter with one of my chirldren, 40 years ago.........Cathy there is one other thing i have found that seems to apply at least to other abducties, and that is a near death exprence has occured at some point in there lives. what would be the chance that you would meat another abductie and also have them experance both of these experances!!!!!!!!!!!We did not report the sighting dew to our age, we didnt think any one would belive it. we all got in to trouble with our parants,because the time lost we didnt know how that could happen and didnt have a way to explain it. i got home it was 8/40pm we left the wedding shower at 7pm. i was the last person out and noticed the time. the hwy was new and there was nothing but one building.Since it was still early we decided to drive down the new hwy. we had no idea about the hour and 40 mi. i was very tired over the next few days..
content.summary: Disk shap large, disapered while looking at it.

content.detailedDescription:
January, 1998, i traveled from charlotte, nc to winston-salem, nc for a job interview. as i approached lake norman on i-77 in my cadillac, under a blue sky with no cloud cover, i noticed three dark objects approaching from my 10 o'clock view at about a 45 degree angle. fascinated at their shapes, unlike any fighter jet i had seen pictures of, i watched every second between watching the road and the objects. traffic was light and i slowed down so i could be under them when they crossed i-77, but it took way longer than i expected. finally, they got close enough i had to bend forward to see up the windshield to see them, then, i leaned my head out the driver's window to look straight up at them. they seemed huge, but as clear as though they were close. there was nothing to relate them to for size or distance. they were completely silent and were not depending on speed to stay aloft, practically just hovering forward, not changing elevation or direction at all. the triangles were longer in the direction they were moving by about 1 2/3 to their back widths. they crossed the highway to my left and i was still almost directly beneath them. there was no detail anywhere on the objects, which were flying in a center point-man forward and two side escorts configuration. the left one was not directly aligned with the right one; it was only slightly more forward, but the center one was ahead of both. i looked carefully for identifying marks, lights, shapes, angles, anything...But the only thing was the length and back-end width and the fact that the three "corners" were slightly rounded off, not sharp pointed and the "black" color was very dull, not reflective at all of the bright daylight. every other second, fascinated, i continued to watch them and the road. when they were about 68 degrees aloft to me on the left, i glanced at the road and back and they were gone! in a half-second, just gone. not a sound, not a cloud nearby. tiny distant white cloud puffs could not have obscured them. it was that kind of sky. 

this is my second experience; i would so like to talk with someone about my first. i never wrote this one or the other one down for years, until now. i wrote the other one to my brother and now this one to you. the other one is not believable, or explainable by science as i understand it, but i was there and it happened. i called my son and told him immediately, that time.   

thanks for this...[name removed/cms/tg].
content.summary: Three black, non-reflecting triangles moving very slowly in tandem, soundlessly; then gone, in a blink.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my mother, brother, nephew, & friend on my mother's back porch overlooking galveston bay when we saw the strange lights at night. my brother & i originally saw an object during the day, & couyldn't figure out what it was. then around midnight of the same day, we all witnessed 2 objects with 3 lights apiece (in a triangular shape). after the 1st 2 faded away, about 5 minutes later, 5 more identical objects appeared. they were silent, seemed 300ft. - 500ft. away, flying above the water, resembled chinese lanterns, but moved too fast, & all made the same 90 degree turn roughly where the unknown object during the day was spotted. they each seemed to fade away at the same location.
content.summary: 7 objects - each with 3 flickering lights, all traveling at same speed & flight path

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

sitting outside in the yard with my girlfriend, smoking a cigarette.

2. what made you first notice the object?

a loud, almost eerie noise that eminated from the object. the aircraft sounded like a cross between a normal plane, and deep roar/humming came from the object itself.

3.What did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

at first glance, the object looked alien, not military, not anything from a museum. it looked bodywise, bobsled like, with two wing-like projections from the nose of the aircraft- and two almost pincer-like back wings.

4. describe the object and its action and motions in detail.

at first glance, the object looked alien, not military, not anything from a museum. it looked bodywise, bobsled like, with two wing-like projections from the nose of the aircraft- and two almost pincer-like back wings. the object seemed to have a grey/black/lead hue to the at this point questionable ufo, resembling that of a beechcraft starship, ending production in 1995.
 there are none of these in our area.

 so that ends your speculation of a beechcraft starship.

 the aircraft seemed to glide, with no propulsion trail behind it, no beam of light, etc. as it left the line of sight, temperatures raised immediately after out of sight. motions and actions seemed like it was heading in a steady direction, nw at 310-315 degrees. moving at possibly 140/150, possibly 200 mph. too fast to truly get much detail. the craft did not seem to have windows, or a cockpit.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting of the object.

feelings of extreme wonder, not panic, but now wanting to see this happen again. my reaction seemed as if it wasn't real at all. i couldn't believe what was in front of my eyes, and nor could my girlfriend. at the time we both questioned our sanity, but ran to get a paper and pencil to try to recreate what the craft was like, roughly.

 we then took the rough sketch to the neighbor, and his response was that he had never seen an aircraft like it, and that he too found it incredibly interesting and would keep a definite eye out.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

we lost sight of the object after it went over a park located to the nw of where we stood. out of sight over the tall trees located to nw.
content.summary: Ufo beechcraft starship-esque ship flies overhead, s to nw 310-315 degrees nw.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Please email for details mufon officials. event is ongoing. refuse to be on tv or part of any entertainment. i just want help with the situation. if you can not provide help without turning into a media spectacle i will find another organization who can. i can not stress this enough, i will not speak to media or be recorded in any way until i know why they've acknowledged me. i do not own a camera that is good enough to capture evidence. if you can not provide assistance in this matter without video or picture evidence, i will look elsewhere for help. email address and vague description is all i can provide at this time as event is ongoing and i will not allow you to publish any information regarding the event or myself at this time. they have chosen to contact me and they only move when i look which implies that the wish to remain private at this time. i am going to respect their wishes to remain private. i will only speak to mufon officials off the record. again, if you wish to publish this information i will find someone who can assist me with this matter while respecting mine and their privacy.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Event is ongoing will not describe for public viewing 12+ orbs around my house countless in the sky. visit every night and follow me wherever i go. please email for further details

content.detailedDescription: Wife took picture of a low military plane about to land heading west. after viewing the pics objects were noticed.
content.summary: Showed up in photo never saw in real life

content.detailedDescription: Back in 2012(nov.)i stepped onto the back patio to have a smoke. i guess i'm a sky watcher but i really wasn't this particular moment. i just wanted a cig. i was standing near the patio table and facing north(towards denver). the time was around 7pm, still light outside but the sun has fallen behind the mountains to my left(west). i don't believe i ever got a cig in my mouth before i saw this shooting star(my first thought)to the west(mountains). it was too bright outside to see something like this. it took a nanosecond to know it was no shooting star. next thought was some kind of space junk entering our atmosphere. it kept making a large burst of light or something and i just wanted a closer look. i did have my binoculars sitting right on the table but i was scared to take my eyes off of it because i thought i wouldn't be able to relocate it. as i fumbled my hands on the table trying to find those binoculars, i noticed it had some kind of trail or shadow...Not chemtrail or smoke, just a dark something that seemed odd. i located the binoculars and took my eyes off of it for only a second to get them to my eyes. what i saw was a round translucent ring, that was flipping. it appeared every time it made a full rotation, it would emit this burst of light or energy. i couldn't believe what i was seeing and lowered the binoculars to get a visual again and didn't see the image nearly as good (i know that's what binoculars do) but i raised them again and saw this ring heading to the east, in a straight line. the total time form when i first saw it to when it was out of sight was about 11 to 14 seconds, at the most. i can only guess at the elevation and the size. i would guess about 20 to 40 thousand feet high and the size is unknown. i would also guess it was huge, or bigger than anything i have seen. i have problems seeing the shape of a plane, but this was perfectly round, no noise, and appeared to be hollow or empty on the inside....Yet, i seem to see a darker space in the middle. not so sure it was the sky. the speed was fast, i say faster than any jet or plane that could cover that distance in such short time....Personally, i wish i would of never saw it because it didn't fit in my reality. it just didn't belong in the sky! every since then i have searched for other similar sightings and only a few have come close. i am a believer of god and a believer of intelligent life on other planets, but i just felt god would not allow others to interfere with earth. so this went against my beliefs or did it? to some degree, it has "jacked" me up and i want to know the truth about everything. unfortunately, it seems the truth has been hidden very well and what we know and what we think is so far apart. this craft was being operated by someone or something. it wasn't some natural occurrence due to weather or man-made object(in my opinion). i knew when i went inside to tell my wife that i will be looked at liked i lost my marbles...B didn't care...I know what i saw! after telling my wife, she looked at me and said "i believe you". how can she? i couldn't believe it myself. i care not who asks me what about what i saw....I will tell them the truth. it was real and i just don't see how this object could carry people or have the power to fly.
content.summary: Translucent white ring, which was flipping or gyrating.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed , when i've been distracted by a strong light through my window. i took off the curtains. i expected to see maybe the moon as i can see sometimes. the first thing i saw was an orange light very bright with a circle form. it was moving in front of me and then it became bigger, stayed path for a few second then slowly change direction and turn on my left to disappear far through the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The ufo had a very bright orange color/ move then path , get bigger/ then move changing direction

content.detailedDescription: I was recently flipping through some pictures i took of my trip to granada, nicaragua in 2011. in two pictures, i saw what appeared to be strange objects in the sky. although they appear small, if you zoom in with computer software such as windows photo viewer, you can see these objects take better shape. honestly, i am not able to answer a majority of the questions listed above because i didn't even notice these objects until now; in fact, the qualities i checked off above only related to the description i was able to get from the 2 photos. i know the date and approx. time of the trip because i checked my passport to see what day i was actually in nicaragua. also, i don't believe these objects to be anything on the lens because i took other pictures as well and all the others are clear without anything else in the sky with the exception of birds. the birds that appear in the other pictures are jet black. also, as you can see, the day was beautiful with a lot of sun and virtually no clouds. i am curious to get some insight as to what these objects may be. i don't buy that they are balloons or weather phenomenon but rather some sort of craft. also, the pictures were in no way edited and these images were in no way manipulated from the original image. i used a regular sony point and shoot camera with i believe 10-12 megapixel capability.
content.summary: 2 pictures found from my trip to nicaragua with objects in them.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch in my yard when i noticed this object coming straight towards me and what caught my eye is that it had no lights, as we live close by an airport, it was odd to see an object flying that fast without any lighting..As it came over the yard the disc banked straight up and down and then leveled out and continued over my house..It was gone within a minute. the entire sighting was about 3 minutes..There was no sound and it was moving much faster than any jet or plane that has ever flown over my home. it did not turn like a normal aircraft, as it went off into the distance it looked like a black dot in the sky.
content.summary: Coming towards the house it looked like a circle with no lights it came over the house and banked sideways then straightened back out and continued steady speed while manuevering

content.detailedDescription: Thought it was posibly a plane on fire comig downward to the south. i saw it mile(s) north of the beaches . then the light suddently dimmed from three light sources to one as it changed direction instantly. it then started going norh east in a irealistic turn. then the light dimmed and fluttered intel it disapeared heading north. i did see what i thought to be a shootig star but my girlfriend who wittnesed both lights wih me said that he star was to slow tonbe a shooing star an hour befor the acused light. i went home and came out to see this sighting. i was sober durig this veiwing. please contact me if any simular reports appear. or if a downed(missig) flight was reported     the light moved south downward then upward then north then north eastsuddently disapeard while light dimmed
content.summary: Light was bright with 3 sources heady south downward. dimmed headed upward continued to dimm heady east slowly disapeared headig north east.

content.detailedDescription: Thought it was posibly a plane on fire comig downward to the south. i saw it mile(s) north of the beaches . then the light suddently dimmed from three light sources to one as it changed direction instantly. it then started going norh east in a irealistic turn. then the light dimmed and fluttered intel it disapeared heading north. i did see what i thought to be a shootig star but my girlfriend who wittnesed both lights wih me said that he star was to slow tonbe a shooing star an hour befor the acused light. i went home and came out to see this sighting. i was sober durig this veiwing. please contact me if any simular reports appear. or if a downed(missig) flight was reported     the light moved south downward then upward then north then north eastsuddently disapeard while light dimmed
content.summary: Light was bright with 3 sources heady south downward. dimmed headed upward continued to dimm heady east slowly disapeared headig north east.

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 2:30 am. wednesday june 4 2014. i was outside sitting on my back patio on my phone shopping online and smoking a cigarette. i dont know what made me lookup from my phone, but when i did, thats when i noticed a yellowish-orange light (it kinda looked like it was outlined in red)moving lower in the sky. i turned my phone off because screen was too bright and i wanted to see this light better. at first, i thought it was a star but quickly realized it wasn't. it was maybe 100 feet in the air decending in a sort of curved 45 degree angle moving at a slow rate of speed. once it got to the treetop it slowed almost to a stop, but looked as if it was bobbing up and down like floating on water. then it moved to the right, and then back to the left. then started decending very slowly. at this point, its behind the tree but i can still see it. it gave me the impression that it was "busy" doing something, like it was there for a purpose.  it would hover and bob up and down and continue to decend. i watched it until it was so low that my back yard fence was in the way of me seeing it anymore.  i was able to see it until it was about 8 feet off the ground. also , where this light is hovering,  there are houses right by the tree its behind and there was a dog barking in that area. i didnt attempt to take pictures or video because #1 i was too scared and #2 i didnt think my pbone would do well picking up the light behind a tree that was probably about 150 feet away. i cant quit thinking about what i saw. i remember i was scared and i wanted to wake my husband up so he could see it too but he was out of town. i told him about it when he got home.
content.summary: Starlike but about the size of 4 stars put together. it decended at a curved 45 degree angle and slowed down at treetop level. it bobbed up and down like it was floating on water. moved left to right a couple times and slowly decended behind tree.

content.detailedDescription:
Clear night sky: no cloud. i was taking my dog out before bed. i witnessed a very bright white light travelling soundlessly north to south. the light was many times brighter than the surrounding stars, considerably brighter than venus: clearly artificial. no navigation lights were visible. it took approximately a minute and a half to travel from one horizon to the other. i lost sight of it when it reached the southern horizon.

planes often travel overhead, but even high altitude planes can be heard, and their navigation lights are usually easily seen. i thought that it may be the international space station. it was much too bright and fast to be a satellite. 

i went back in the house and checked the location of the iss online, but it was currently above the eastern seaboard and not visible from my location. i checked a flight-checker website for planes in the area, but the closest plane was on a different heading,at 36000 feet and approximately 50 kilometers to the north of me, whereas the light vanished to my south. 

it was not consistent with any aerial phenomenon i am familiar with. if it were a plane, it's brightness and speed would suggest a lower altitude, and yet it was utterly silent and i could make out no navigation lights in spite of the fact that i witnessed it in several profiles: approaching me, passing overhead and from the 'rear' as it receded from me.

i am struck by my inability to clearly identify it. i am unable to even give a 'likely' explanation that fits what i observed.

eric gilmer
content.summary: Very bright white light travelling roughly north to south. silent. no navigation lights.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were walking back towards his house on a foggy night and we were on the road and we both stopped and looked over in the field and spotted these four lanky, tall, green/blue creatures which made clicking sounds and then took off across the creek and up the hill into the woods
content.summary: Four glowing,lanky, tall creatures spotted

content.detailedDescription: I was raised on a farm where both my fathet and uncle witnessed ufo's.
content.summary: Farm ufo
